name: GetTagsByEntityId
description:
Retrieve tags for Users, Teams, or Escalation Policies.

Use this tool to get tags related to a specific User, Team, or Escalation Policy by their ID. Useful for filtering and organizing entities based on applied tags.

parameters.description: Specifies the type of entity (users, teams, escalation_policies) to retrieve related tags for.

value_schema.description: Type of entity related with the tag

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource for which to retrieve tags. This ID corresponds to a specific User, Team, or Escalation Policy.
